00036 #ifndef MESQUITE_POWER_HPP
00037 #define MESQUITE_POWER_HPP
00038 
00039 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00040 
00041 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00042 
00043 class Exponent
00044 {
00045   public:
00046     
00047     typedef double (Exponent::*constMemberPtr)(double) const;
00048     static constMemberPtr get_func_ptr( double exponent );
00049   
00050     Exponent( ) : funcPointer( 0 ) 
00051       {}
00052   
00053     explicit Exponent( double exponent ) 
00054       : mExponent(exponent), 
00055         funcPointer( get_func_ptr( exponent ) )
00056       {}
00057     
00058     inline double raise( double value ) const
00059       { return (this->*funcPointer)( value ); }
00060     
00061     void set_exponent( double exponent );
00062     
00063     inline Exponent& operator=( double d )
00064       { set_exponent(d); return *this; }
00065     
00066     //inline operator double () const
00067     //  { return mExponent; }
00068     inline double value() const
00069       { return mExponent; }
00070     
00071     double pow0( double x ) const;
00072     double pow1( double x ) const;
00073     double squareRoot( double x ) const;
00074     double cubeRoot( double x ) const;
00075     double invCubeRoot( double x ) const;
00076     double powTwoThirds( double x ) const;
00077     double invTwoThirds( double x ) const;
00078     double pow2( double x ) const;
00079     double powPositiveInt( double x ) const;
00080     double std_pow( double x ) const;
00081     double inverse( double x ) const;
00082     double invSquareRoot( double x ) const;
00083     double powThreeHalves( double x ) const;
00084     double invSquare( double x ) const;
00085     double powNegativeInt( double x ) const;
00086 
00087   private:
00088   
00089     double mExponent;
00090     constMemberPtr funcPointer;
00091 };
